I have a similar situation. Heymax when searched indicated as 5812. But when I paid it was flagged as 5814. I checked with heymax and they mentioned that some merchants may be using both codes depending on payment method (ie if you charge using paywave it may be 5814 while if you pay using ShopBack link to cc it may be 5812). So what u search in heymax may have a small chance be different if it wasn‚Äôt the payment method heymax tracked.
How you see it being flagged as 5814? Need to check with CSO? Even 5814 shld have the base points ma.
